ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] New quest in Firiona Vie
ygData.msgSnippet: So far my favorite mob in Kunark is the Sarnak - they look awesome, especially their armor. I really wish they had made them the player race model instead of
ygData.messageBody:
So far my favorite mob in Kunark is the Sarnak - they look awesome,
especially their armor. I really wish they had made them the player race
model instead of the Iksar (have you seen iksar melee? They look really -
odd). Sarnak hide mask *dr00l*...

Sartori D'Elsiraad<Legion>
53rd Karaoke Singer of Veeshan


>From: "Cyr, Thierry" <thierry.cyr@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@egroups.com
>To: "'eqbards@egroups.com'" <eqbards@egroups.com>
>Subject: RE: [eqbards] New quest in Firiona Vie
>Date: Tue, 16 May 2000 11:20:31 -0500
>
>speaking of which, what/where/how hard drops the Iksar illusion mask? and
>is
>it like the old guise of deceiver(anyone can use) or the new guise of
>deception (has to be equipped)?
>
>and reguarding cool lookin mobs, the golems in Chardok scared the shit out
>of me last night when i saw one running my way like a locomotive. amen for
>enchanters
>
>-Rakka
>Sol Ro
